document_name: Law providing for legal conditions of disaster management
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/KAZ/1993/KAZ-1993-10-15-Law providing for legal conditions of disaster management_3052f7d6d930ff921825f0ca3fa9531b.pdf
document_description: This act defines states of emergency in Kazakhstan, as well as the procedures for declaring them. It also clarifies the government's role in disaster risk management during states of emergency and requires the government to compensate individuals for loss and damage caused by disasters.
